title: Experience
firstExperience.description: I embarked on the first steps of my professional journey, making significant contributions to the university's technological landscape:
firstExperience.details.first: I served as an assistant in data analysis, utilizing the database to create required reports that optimized various business processes.
firstExperience.details.second: My involvement extended to the enhancement of a the corporative Desktop App according to the requirements, pivotal to managing diverse business processes and automate some manual tasks.
secondExperience.description: I played a pivotal role in orchestrating the successful execution of several projects and requirements that streamlined academic processes, some key tasks in my role have been:
secondExperience.details.first: I coordinated the development of a several requirements for the corporative Web App and Desktop App designed to manage a wide array of academic processes for both students and teachers.
thirdExperience.description: An experience full of unexpected challenges and first steps with various technical skills, some key tasks in my role have been:
thirdExperience.details.first: I contributed to a significant project aimed at enhancing an e-commerce platform for a foreign client. I took charge of developing some UI components, implementing real-time features and integrating the communication with the backend components.
thirdExperience.details.second: I designed and implemented the Frontend architecture for a Corporative newsletters Web Application, developed comprehensive UX/UI elements that aligned with client requirements.
fourthExperience.description: An enriching experience putting my technical versatility into practice in the development of several projects, some key tasks in my role have been:
fourthExperience.details.first: In my initial project, I collaborated with a wide-ranging team to redesign a property management platform. My responsibilities included developing UI features and making crucial adjustments to the existing codebase.
fourthExperience.details.second: I played a supporting part in enhancing the UX/UI of a property rental platform of a foreigner client closely aligning with the client's requirements.
fifthExperience.description: I was involved in the execution of two distinct projects, it has been one of the experiences with the biggest technical challenges and lessons learned with a diverse team, some key tasks in my role have been:
fifthExperience.details.first: I was in charge of the development of core communication between the Web and the Blockchain components for an NFT Marketplace MVP. As a key member of the team, I designed and implemented interfaces that facilitated part of the user interaction throught an interactive Web Application.
fifthExperience.details.second: I played a role in creating an small chatbot solution aimed at enhancing issue resolution and process management for a client.
sixthExperience.description: Currently focusing on a credit line project for a well-recognized nationwide client, I have performed slightly well on the project due to experiences with a similar tech stack in the past, some key tasks in my role have been:
sixthExperience.details.first: I had the task of migrating the Web Project to Bootstrap 5 and a CSS Refactoring for some components. Together with a colleague we had the task of redesigning some components according to UX/UI requirements.
